seedGroups.name: Shattering
seedGroups.description: Shattering seeds can be tough to visually judge for ripeness. Use a *gentle* touch test to see if the seeds easily loosen.

species.description: Shattering. Same treatment as H. acutiloba. White or lavender flowers pop up on fuzzy stalks, over a cluster of last yearâ€™s leaves. Happiest on drier slopes, the low moisture and slow erosion reduces competition from other plants. Rare, collect 10%
